name: Karen Smith
text: Great pizza every time. Yum!! And the GF pizza dough is good too!

name: Peter Holvenstot
text: Very narrow hours (a pizza place not open after 8 on weekends/primetime?).  Frequently forgotten sauces.

name: Paige Fritz
text: Jett and Candy are awesome! and the 4 cheese cajun bread is absolutely amazing!

name: Jen Smith
text: Connor rocks!!!!! I received amazing customer service from him! I had called and ordered a pizza and then locked my keys in my vehicle and was unable to pick up the pizza on time so I can contact them just to let him know that I would be …More

name: Matt Panfil
text: First time for the bbq chicken pizza. Dang was it good.

name: Patrick
text: Always very greasy, burnt crust, and the flavored crust is typically wrong.

name: Gregg Hettel
text: Very adequate pizza for when you're hungry.

name: Justin Van Volkenburg
text: Decent pizza.  The size of the toppings could be improved.

name: Colton Fay
text: I’ve been to this place almost 100 times through the years and every single time it’s always awesome. The staff is super friendly and not once have they been behind on my order. It’s always hot and ready when I get there. Super clean store and great pizza!!

name: Jack Mattila
text: Slow delivery, lady yanked the money out of my hand. When she came to the door I said hi how are you she mumbled something I couldn’t understand and dropped the pizza off and left.

name: Karen Wilt
text: Clean! Very friendly and helpful. Delicious pizza.

name: Jean Stone-Brown
text: I ordered the small calzone like always and when I got home discovered you have a new Italian dressing.  Yuck!  Wrecked my calzone!  Done with them

name: Grateful Grower
text: Service was slow and they never have the grab and go pizza like they advertise.  The pizza was bland, it is best to just go with jets pizza!  Jets pizza is fast and amazing

name: Dan Delaney
text: The staff is helpful and friendly.

name: cheese man
text: I ordered a pizza and never got anything. The car never even went through my neighborhood. Extremely upsetting

name: ike R.
text: Called in to order a pizza at 9:30 knowing they close at 10:00 to my surprise I sat on hold for 29 minutes until one very rude employee answered the phone to say “sorry were now closed”. Frustrated I asked her for her name who then …More

name: Gracie Burden
text: Worst experience ever, NEVER use this location,  they told me that I was in delivery range so I ordered, they charged me and told me I would get my food shortly. After waiting about 45 minutes for our food we got a call saying that we …More

name: Janice Ignagni
text: Perfect!

name: Delaney Heathman
text: The employee in store was great and our order was completely correct.

name: connor bidwell
text: Good pizza great prices

name: Chris Jennings
text: Most times it's a 4 or 5 star. But this past Friday night was not. Called in an order at 540. They said 15-20min. I got there at 6pm. When I walked in there was a lady and her daughter at the counter who called their order in before me and …More

name: Jeremy Keen
text: Great deals, friendly staff, delicious boneless wings

name: Dargisio Baldassarra
text: Pizza was ok

name: Amber
text: We have ordered from this Hungry Howies location numerous times and the pizza has always been fresh and really good. Tonight , our whole order was pretty sad! We got regular Pepsi instead of the diet that I ordered. The pizza tasted like it …More

name: Darrick Morkert
text: Great pizza and service. I've used pick-up and delivery and they are always fast. Once the driver forgot the dipping sauce for the bread sticks, he promptly brought two back.

name: Steve Romankewiz
text: Very impressed with their speed when we didn't order enough pizzas for 200 kids. Thank you for your hard work.

name: Meagan Chrysler
text: Always friendly and get my order right!

name: Joanne Dinser
text: Super nice phone service.  Questions answered and Steve helped me select the best value to feed a couple of kids.  Thank you!

name: Randy *
text: Stopped in like twice a week for the last month or so. 3 times out of 20 they had a grab and go ready. Never ready - Place closes early all the time - Employees seem to run the place - never seen a manager there or anyone who looks over 19 Years old.

name: Micheal Keling
text: Great pizza and reliably very fast delivery. We often get our pizza in half the time quoted. Friendly staff and never had a bad experience.

name: Thomas Magill
text: I've been buying Pizzas for years at this store and have never had a bad experience. Pizzas are always fantastic.

name: Joan Stafford
text: Hungry Howie's customer service is excellent! I made a special request this evening, and the staff cheerfully agreed! We'll definitely be coming back here.

name: Joshua Sinda
text: The staff was very friendly! But the pizza was mediocre at best, i feel no passion for the food they create. I ordered a thin crust pizza along with the howie roll. The pizza was over cooked, but the howie roll was perfect, consistencie was not up to par!

name: Jon Lozer
text: My hometown pizza joint. There's better, but I grew up on Howies. Good deals, too.

name: nate nuttle
text: Created a order online for delivery.  They first claimed that it was made for pick up, although i typed in my address for the delivery.  When i called they claimed that they dont Deliver here even when ive ordered from this location before. …More

name: Chuck Hansen
text: Staff is always nice and pizza has always been done correctly. We even order everything crust and they do it well everytime.

name: David Steffes
text: This goes back to with in the last 2 yrs, i just never wrote a review until now.  So...This place screwed up 3 times, and I will NEVER, EVER use this location. I'll go to a different Howie's or competitor. …More

name: Marge Ross
text: Very good pizza. Polite staff.

name: Andrea Hurst
text: Great pizza and wings!

name: Swk K
text: Excellent pizza and sides!

name: Mrs. Liebert
text: Always great service, clean store and fast delivery.

name: Brandie Flowers
text: Empolyees are great. Pizza was very good.

name: Kristen Reish
text: Not quite sure how “cheese pizza” translates to “with banana peppers”? Probably had the order mixed up bc the girl who answered the phone didn’t ask for our name or order....just answered “hello?” The Hawaiian pizza had proper toppings but had bubbles all over the pizza.

name: christopher martindale
text: It's the crust...so good

name: vincent niemi
text: I love it

name: Dave Lockwood
text: Good food

text: 2bad

text: Pizza was made for me .  Ready in ten minutes.

text: Love the clean store

name: Lenard Kass

text: Always ready...and it's delicious

text: Fast service.

text: It's hungry Howie's pizza. It's alright and sometimes they mess your order up.
